Title: Wingmom
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Lew Schneider, Marty Abbe-Schneider
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: After Murray agrees to let him join ROTC, Barry asks Beverly to get him out of it. Adam objects when Pops buys a Florida timeshare.
